DataTable.Caption: 商品名称
DataTable.TableName: SQLQuery::select b.*,a.orgId,a.kucunzhuangtai,SUM(a.kucunshuliang) AS kucunshuliang,c.pihao, c.shengchanriqi, c.youxiaoqizhi | from xyy_erp_bill_shangpinpihaokucun a, xyy_erp_dic_shangpinjibenxinxi b, xyy_erp_dic_shangpinpihao c where a.shangpinID = b.goodsid and c.ID= a.pihaoID and b.dongjie=1 and b.shifouhuodong=1 and b.status=40 @shangpin @pihao @orgID @kucunzhuangtai order by a.createTime desc
DataTable.Head: false
